title: IMPOSSIBLY SLOW UPDATE
body:
So I have version 7.16 and am trying to update to the latest. It looks like the update file size is in the 5gb range. Your junk updater
A: downloads at the rate of 30kpbs
B: restarts every time the client restarts
C: I'm not leaving this power hog of a beast on for 1096 minutes to get around this issue
D: I am already running as administrator and pando media browser has been gone for many moons.

HALP PLUZ

replies.body:
The media booster is part of an old patching system that is no longer used, and updates are now downloaded directly from our patching server.  Is your game installing directly to your internal primary drive, or an external storage?  An external storage would only temporary download updates, so it would requires redownloading every time it restarts.  My recommendation in this case would be to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and try a force repatch to wipe any bad files, repair them, and get new files.

If the issue persists, run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well in case anything beyond running as admin might be blocking your files from saving.  I hope that helps!
